item.title: About Me
item.description: Mohamed Al Asha'l a software engineer with a 6+ years of experience in building small to enterprise ready softwares in different fields utilizing the power of the ecosystem available there without restricting myself to a certain language/tool/environment, I'm an engineer who get things done simply with no hassle nor complixty, as well I'm a big fan of the opensource world, so you'll find a github profile for me, github. Now I'm working @speakol (a native-ads platform).
